title: Trump Terror Causes Biden To Force Girls Into Military Draft As More Die Of Vaccines Than Covid
cleaned_text:
"The News You Need Today…For The World You’ll Live In Tomorrow."

What You Aren’t Being Told About The World You Live In

How The “Conspiracy Theory” Label Was Conceived To Derail The Truth Movement

How Covert American Agents Infiltrate the Internet to Manipulate, Deceive and Destroy Reputations

Trump Terror Causes Biden To Force Girls Into Military Draft As More Die Of Vaccines Than Covid

By: Sorcha Faal, and as reported to her Western Subscribers

A thought-provoking new Security Council (SC) report circulating in the Kremlin today first noting the Russian Embassy in the United States warning the regime of Supreme Socialist Leader Joe Biden against plans of deploying hypersonic missiles in Europe, with them stating: “We would like to remind Pentagon Press Secretary John Kirby that potential deployment of any US hypersonic missile in Europe would be extremely destabilizing...Their short flight time would leave Russia little to no decision time and raise likelihood of inadvertent conflict”, says accelerating the alarm within the Ministry of Defense (MoD) about the development of American hypersonic missiles is them able to be fitted with the new line of 475-kiloton thermonuclear warheads now rolling off the assembly line of the semi-autonomous agency of the US Department of Energy named the National Nuclear Security Administration.

This report notes that Russia is the only country in the world that can deploy hypersonic weapons—such as the Avangard hypersonic missile system deployed in 2019, and the invincible Kinzhal hypersonic missile system deployed this year—but warns the United States is currently testing their hypersonic missile system AGM-183A, whose speed of 15,000 miles-per-hour can reach Moscow in 20-minutes if launched from America, and in as little as 7-minutes if launched from Europe—does see Russia being able to defend itself against a hypersonic missile attack with the S-500 Prometheus air defense system, that’s been dubbed the “Killer of F-35” because it’s able to destroy every American stealth aircraft and satellites in space—this morning saw the MoD reporting: “The S-500 cutting-edge missile system has carried out a test combat shooting at the Kapustin Yar training ground to strike a fast-moving ballistic target…According to data recorders, the target was engaged...We plan that the first S-500 system will be procured to the Moscow Region’s air and missile defense unit after a full cycle of tests is completed”—but most critical to note is that Russia has already warned the United States that it will perceive any missile launched at its territory as a nuclear attack that warrants a full and total nuclear retaliation.

Security Council Members in this transcript note that the likelihood of socialist leader Biden ordering a first strike nuclear attack on Russia is increasing by the day, specifically because Biden and his socialist Democrat Party forces know the day is drawing closer when they’ll have to answer for their crimes against the American people—and in seeking to forestall their eventual doom, can be expected to lash out in desperation as all illegitimate despotic regimes throughout history have done.

Best exampling the terror gripping Biden and his godless socialist Democrats, this report details, is their reaction to the news that President Donald Trump has told some of his closest aides in the Republican Party that he’s planning to run for president again in 2024—terrifying news to these socialist demons that was quickly followed by the fake news leftist propaganda media screaming that President Trump is implicated in a tax scheme—saw socialist Democrats in the US Congress rushing to make a new law to keep President Trump from becoming the Speaker of the House in 2022—saw socialist leader Biden rushing through a proposal to reverse President Trump’s opening for American loggers 3.4-million acres in the Northwest—then saw Biden reversing President Trump’s order to give the American people shower heads that give them more water to bathe with—that was quickly followed by socialist Democrats in the US Senate rushing to create a new law to force for the first time in history young girls into the military draft—all of which was joined by top socialist Democrat Party official Alexandra Chalupa sending out the ominous threatening message: “Donald J. Trump's security is dangerously poor, he needs immediate serious protection…Putin has no use for him other than disposing of him in a manner that will have horrific implications for the US for next 100 years as a third of the country will reject the federal government”.

Why Biden and his socialist Democrats are living in daily terror about what’s soon to befall them, this report details, President Trump best explained this week when he stated: “Americans are refusing to get vaccinated because they don’t trust Biden’s administration, they don’t trust the election results, and they certainly don’t trust the fake news, which is refusing to tell the truth”—an explanation further solidified by Republican Party lawmaker US Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene, who yesterday was suspended from posting by leftist tech giant Twitter—a Twitter suspension of Congresswoman Greene for so-called “Covid misinformation” widely reported on by the leftist propaganda media, none of whom put in their lying articles what exactly she said—which shouldn’t be surprising, because what Congresswoman Greene posted to Twitter that got her suspended was the darkest deadly secret being kept hidden from the American people, and saw her truthfully stating: “The controversial #COVID19 vaccines should not be forced on our military for a virus that is not dangerous for non-obese people and those under 65...With 6,000 vax related deaths and many concerning side effects reported, the vax should be a choice not a mandate for everyone”.

Most astonishing to notice about Congresswoman Greene’s suspension from Twitter for “Covid misinformation”, this report notes, is that the figure she used of 6,000 people dying from Covid vaccines in America is actually less than what the US government is reporting in their Vaccine Adverse Reporting System (VAERS) database—is a VAERS database that for the past two weeks has reported more Americans dying from Covid vaccines than Covid itself, and as of now is reporting 11,140 Covid vaccine deaths—but most grimly to note, is that the VAERS database is just one of an estimated at least 11 such US government systems recording Covid vaccine deaths in America—a fact confirmed yesterday when a beyond shocking new lawsuit was filed by America’s Frontline Doctors against US Department of Health and Human Services Secretary Xavier Becerra, wherein it documents with proof that 45,000 Americans have died within three days of receiving their COVID-19 shot.

Security Council Members in this transcript note that what Biden and his socialist forces are actually doing in keeping the deadly truth about Covid vaccines hidden from the American people by instituting the Soviet Union military doctrine known as “Dedovshchina”—a socialist doctrine that made it taboo for any citizen to openly criticize the Soviet military for its cruel abuses—when the Soviet military invaded Afghanistan in 1976 saw this doctrine employed to keep hidden the deaths and wounding of over 70,000 Russian solders—but saw this socialist doctrine failing when the “Committee of Soldiers Mothers” organized mothers and grandmothers throughout the Motherland to tell the truth about this cruel war to the Russian people—the end result of which led to the total collapse of the Soviet Union.

Security Council Members in this transcript next note that before Biden and his godless socialist forces seized power, the United States never instituted a similar “Dedovshchina” doctrine to keep true things hidden from their citizens—a fact best exampled in 1976 when a novel disease escaped from a bio warfare testing lab in Fort Dix New Jersey designated as the Swine Flu—which caused an epidemic the US government rushed out a vaccine for and used on 25% of their population—but when just 4,000 serious adverse reactions were reported in those taking the Swine Flu vaccine, it saw the entire American media establishment exploding in righteous rage and stopping any more Americans from getting the Swine Flu vaccine—and whose eerie similarities to what is now occurring can’t be overlooked, specifically because the Fort Detrick bio warfare lab in Maryland was mysteriously shut down in August-2019 right before Covid appeared—which explains why over 500,000 Chinese citizens have signed a joint letter to the World Health Organization calling for a probe into the Fort Detrick bio warfare lab to “prevent” future epidemics—and because of the tens-of-thousands of Covid vaccine deaths occurring all around the world, further explains whey the Chinese government is refusing to mandate these vaccines for its citizens.

With more Americans by the day learning the horrible and deadly truth of what’s being done to them, this report continues, terror stricken Biden, his socialist forces, along with leftist big tech giants and the fake news propaganda media, have gone into full panic mode—best exampled by the hysterical propaganda lies they’re spreading about the Delta Variant of Covid, whose symptoms resemble the common cold and doesn’t require hospitalization—a fact confirmed by Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, who reports zero hospitalizations for those testing positive for the Delta Variant—a fact further confirmed by the statistics showing that among the nearly 1-million patient beds in America, its sees barely 40,000 of them occupied by Covid patients, of whom only 2,802 are in serious condition needing respirators.

Most important to notice about the hospitalized Covid patients in America, this report details, is that they are all elderly people over 80 and those having serious underlying conditions like obesity, diabetes, cancer and/or heart disease—and to this very day, sees no child in America having died of Covid—a fact just confirmed by the prestigious medial institution Johns Hopkins, who worked with the nonprofit FAIR Health to analyze approximately 48,000 children under 18 diagnosed with Covid in health-insurance data from April to August-2020, and found a mortality rate of ZERO among children without a pre-existing medical condition such as leukemia.

Where one would expect any rational government to celebrate the fact that no child has died from Covid, this report concludes, the exact opposite is happening in America—best exampled by Biden’s lunatic top Covid advisor Dr. Antony Fauci insanely demanding that 3-year-old babies be forced to wear masks—an insane demand joined by socialist Democrat Party forces loyal to Biden instituting new mask mandates—deranged mask mandates coming at the exact same time the top Covid advisor to the British government openly admitted that masks are just “comfort blankets” that do virtually nothing—further saw British Prime Minister Boris Johnson openly admitting the truth that people dying of Covid are mostly all over 80—but as to if the American people will ever be told these truths by their lying fake news leftist propaganda media establishment bowing at the feet of socialist leader Biden, this doesn’t appear likely—and as best exampled this week by author Michael Wolff, who live on air told CNN fake news host Brian Stelter to his face about what’s really happening: “It’s your fault…You become part of, one of the parts of the problem of the media...You come on here, and you have a monopoly on truth…You know exactly how things are supposed to be done...You are why one of the reasons people can’t stand the media...People have genuine problems with the media, the media doesn’t get the story right…The media exists in its own bubble...Don’t talk so much, listen more”. [Note: Some words and/or phrases appearing in quotes in this report are English language approximations of Russian words/phrases having no exact counterpart.]
